metadata.name: HackTool - LocalPotato Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the LocalPotato POC based on basic PE metadata information and default CLI examples

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\localpotato.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe -i c:\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-o windows\\')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=e1742ee971d6549e8d4d81115f88f1fc')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=dd82066efba94d7556ef582f247c8bb5'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the LocalPotato POC based on basic PE metadata information and default CLI examples
